title: Ticket #5638: Support multi-core jobs  in blahp submitting to condor
description: When the blahp submits into Condor, multi-core job attributes are either ignored or rejected. It should translate NodeNumber to request_cpus in the Condor submit file. Also, it shouldn't reject some of the other multi-core options.
remarks:
2016-Apr-18 15:55:14 by dweitzel:
Specifically, the option to not ignore is -S that breaks htcondor-ce compatibility.
check_ins:
